DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify whether OPC-12759 ophthalmic suspension effective compare active control dry eye patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Out patient 2 . Subjective complaint dry eye present minimum 20 month 3 . Ocular discomfort severity moderate severe 4 . Corneal conjunctival damage moderate severe 5 . Unanesthetized Schirmer 's test score 5mm/5minutes less 6 . Best correct visual acuity 0.2 good eye 1 . Presence anterior segment disease disorder associate keratoconjunctivitis sicca 2 . Ocular hypertension patient glaucoma patient ophthalmic solution 3 . Anticipated use topicallyinstilled ocular medication patient discontinue use study 4 . Anticipated use contact lens study 5 . Patient punctal plug 6 . Any history ocular surgery within 12 month 7 . Female patient pregnant , possibly pregnant breast feed 8 . Known hypersensitivity component study drug procedural medication 9 . Receipt investigational product within 4 month .
